verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> on <S%H5058>Neginoth,<s%> <S%H4905>Maschil,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David,<s%> when the <S%H2130>Ziphims<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> Doth <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> hide <S%H5641>himself<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> us? <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God,<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H1777>judge<s%> me by thy <S%H1369>strength.<s%>
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H8605>prayer,<s%> O <S%H430>God;<s%> give <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, and <S%H6184>oppressors<s%> seek <S%H1245>after<s%> my <S%H5315>soul:<s%> they have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> them. <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is mine <S%H5826>helper:<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> is with them that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
He shall <S%H7725>reward<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto mine <S%H8324>enemies:<s%> cut them <S%H6789>off<s%> in thy <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I will <S%H5071>freely<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto thee: I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> it is <S%H2896>good.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> he hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6869>trouble:<s%> and mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> his desire upon mine <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
